name: ScreeningForTobaccoUseInPrior30Days
title: Screening for Tobacco Use in Prior 30 Days
description: this value set probably needs to be deleted
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts and codes that represent an assessment of whether a patient has used tobacco within the last 30 days prior to the assessment.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are currently tobacco users.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the datatype "Risk Category Assessment".),(Inclusion Criteria: This assessment uses a look back period of 30 days for assessing if a patient is a current tobacco user.),(Exclusion Criteria: The patient is excluded if they have a history of tobacco use or tobacco use is documented as a risk factor.)

concept.display: Have you used tobacco in the last 30 days [SAMHSA]

contains.display: Have you used tobacco in the last 30 days [SAMHSA]
